            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can now use FPS to settle Government General Demand Note as well as the bills issued by the following government departments:<br></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Environmental Protection Department - Waste Disposal Charging Scheme<br></li>
 <li>Gov Bill - Food and Environmental Hygiene Department - Market Stall Rent<br></li>
 <li>Hongkong Post Bill Payment</li>
 <li>Inland Revenue Department</li>
 <li>Lands Department (Government Rent and/or Premium Instalment)</li>
 <li>Legal Aid Department</li>
 <li>Marine Department</li>
 <li>Rating and Valuation Department (Rates and/or Government Rent)</li>
 <li>Water Supplies Department</li>
 <li>Working Family and Student Financial Assistance Agency (Student Finance Office – Student Loan Repayment)</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Simply open the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app and scan the QR code printed on your bill to settle payment instantly.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Say goodbye to long queues!</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Step 1:</strong> Select 'Make an FPS transfer' from the bottom left corner of your Mobile Banking log on screen.<br> <br> <strong>Step 2:</strong> Select 'Scan to pay'.<br> <br> <strong>Step 3:</strong> Scan the QR code printed on the government bill.<br> <br> <strong>Step 4:</strong> Enter your  6-digit Mobile Banking PIN, Mobile Security Key password or use biometric authentication to verify your identity.<br> <br> <strong>Step 5:</strong> Add and review the payment details.<br> <br> <strong>Step 6:</strong> Enter your 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN, Mobile Security Key password or use biometric authentication to further authenticate the transaction (if applicable).<br> <br> <strong>Step 7:</strong> Payment successful. We'll send you confirmation by SMS and email.</p>
